system.description: The character has learned to fight with a weapon in each hand, allowing them to unleash devastating dual attacks.
system.benefit: Character can wield two one-handed ranged weapons or two one-handed melee weapons at once. They can make a Two-Weapon Wielding Attack as a Half Action, Attacks are made at -20, however the character can make one Half-Action Duration attack action with each weapon (be it Single Attack, Swift Attack, Lightning Attack, Single Shot, Semi-Auto Burst, or Full Auto Burst). This talent can be taken multiple times: Two-Weapon Wielder (Ranged) (BS Aptitude), and Two-Weapon Wielder (Melee) (WS Aptitude). Both are required to wield a melee and ranged weapon combination. Other Talents, such as Ambidextrous, Blademaster, Gunslinger, Sidearm, etc, improve on this one.
system.notes: Can be taken twice (once for Ranged, once for Melee)

specialAbilities.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
specialAbilities.description: As a Half Action, attack with both weapons at -20. Each weapon can perform one Half-Action attack (Standard Attack, Swift Attack, Lightning Attack, etc.).
